variant.bodyText: Following is a listing of the 1985 members of the Association for Computational Linguistics as of 3 December 1985. Personal members are listed first, ordered alphabetically by last name. Institutional members follow, ordered alphabetically by country, province (for Canada), city, and then institutional name; for the United States, the sorting is by ZIP-code. Wanted: Addresses for the members whose names appear below. Information should be forwarded to the ACL Secretary- Treasurer.

variant.note: 1985 ACL MEMBERSHIP LIST Following is a listing of the 1985
variant.abstract: of the for Linguistics of 3 December 1985. Personal members are listed first, ordered alphabetically by last name. Institutional members follow, ordered alphabetically by country, province (for Canada), city, and then institutional name; for the United States, the sorting is by ZIP-code. Wanted: Addresses for the members whose names appear below. Information should be forwarded to the ACL Secretary- Treasurer.
